features.description: I assess the accessibility of your websites and web applications for people with disabilities (visual, motor, or cognitive). Upon request, I can also implement the necessary fixes.

features.description: I leverage your brand guidelines to design streamlined interfaces adapted to the needs of people with disabilities. Once approved, I ensure frontend integration compliant with accessibility standards.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This website, simon-lm.dev, is a personal portfolio created and edited by Simon LM. Published in January 2025, it aims to fully comply with the French General Accessibility Improvement Framework (RGAA) criteria by March 2025. Digital accessibility is a priority to ensure that all people, including those with disabilities, can navigate and interact with this site without barriers.

conformity.title: Compliance Status
conformity.content: Currently, this site is partially compliant with RGAA 4.1 criteria. Adjustments are ongoing to achieve full compliance.

improvements.title: Planned Improvements
improvements.content: The identified areas for improvement include:
items: Verification and optimization of compatibility with assistive technologies (screen readers, for example)
Improvement of keyboard navigation to ensure a smooth and accessible experience
Provision of additional options to adjust contrasts and colors

contact.title: Feedback Procedure and Contact
contact.content: If you notice an accessibility issue on this site, please inform me through the contact form. Please describe the problem in detail (page concerned, nature of the difficulty, technologies used, etc.). I commit to analyzing your request and responding as soon as possible while implementing the necessary corrections.

recourse.title: Legal Recourse

legal.content: Digital accessibility is governed by Article 47 of Law No. 2005-102 of February 11, 2005, for equal rights and opportunities. Although this is a personal website and not subject to the same obligations as public sites, I voluntarily commit to respecting these standards to ensure inclusive navigation.
